cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRIT Aid IC MAJESTY !S GOVERNM1SECRETW.P. (10+) 15712TE MARCH,, 19i.]ACOPY NO.WAR CABINETIRELAND.Note by the SgcrgfearySir William. Davison has given- private notice ofthe annexed Question, which he propose;' to address to thePrime Minister after Questions on Tuesday, ll+th March, 19kk.(Signed) E;0Et. BRIDGES.Offices of the War Cabinet,S o '"'/ o It? ;12th March? ISkk.ANNEX/' -To ask the Prime Minister whether in view ofthe refusal by the Government of Eire of the Americanrequest supported by Great Britain that Axis Consularand diplomatic representatives should be removed from Eire,having regard to the serious danger to the Allies inconnection with the forthcoming invasion of Europe in having .a centre of espionage within the British Isles, he can assure the House that adequate steps are being taken to minimise this danger, whether by the isolation of communications with Eireor otherwise.
